_sText:
STEAMGAMERS.COM | MiniGames | *Funtastic* @ 72.26.196.164:27015
Feel free to message me with any questions by joining the following group and opening a chat with me @ [SG] Pauls Group
This map is all about stay alive for 2 minutes by getting out of the way from falling blocks and even sometimes the pillars flying around. After 2 minutes both teams will be teleported to different locations and recieve a knife. They can then either take the ladder to the ump/ scouts or take the lift to the scouts/ one AWP. Thanks to 3kliksphilip for giving me permission to edit 3k_smash. Mg_3k_smash_redux remake by [SG] Paul Thanks!
